brief.visual: Close Up. Dark screen. Focus on dying red embers in a stone fireplace.

stills.feedback: הגחלים נראים מרחפים, האש נראת "מנותקת" ולא שורפת את העצים

brief.visual: Medium Shot. Miri kneeling by the fireplace, holding an unlit lantern.

stills.feedback: זה לא נראה שהיא "תופסת" את העששית, זה נראה שהעששית מרחפת

brief.visual: Close Up. Taking a small stick, lighting it from the embers.
Close Up. Transferring the flame to the lantern wick. It ignites.

stills.feedback: גם כאן, לא רואים את הפנים של מירי, ואם בהמשך השוט אמורים לראות את הפנים שלה תהיה את אותה בעיה כמו בשוט 1

brief.visual: Medium Shot. Miri's face illuminated by the new warm light. She looks worried.
Wide Shot. She stands up in the dark room, holding the only light.

stills.feedback: היא נראת קצת "מרחפת" על הכיסא השאלה היא איך הוידאו יתמודד עם זה

brief.visual: Close Up. Hand reaching for the door handle. Hesitation.

stills.feedback: גם כאן לא רואים את מירי (אותה בעיה כמו שוט 1)

brief.visual: Medium Shot. She opens the door. Wind blows in, flame flickers but stays.
Over Shoulder. Miri stepping out into the cold blue night.
Wide Shot. The cottage door closes. Miri is now a small light in the dark world.
Wide Shot. Trees bending in the wind. Miri is a small light in chaos.
Medium Shot. Wind blows her hair across her face, she struggles.
Close Up. The flame flickering wildly inside the glass.
Medium Shot. She stumbles but keeps moving.
Close Up. Her hands gripping the handle tightly, knuckles white.
Wide Shot. Shadows of trees dancing scary shapes on the ground.
Medium Shot. She shields the lantern with her whole body.
Close Up. Fear in her eyes as a branch breaks nearby.
Medium Shot. Walking against strong resistance (wind).
Wide Shot. A massive gust of wind hits her.
Medium Shot. Miri falls to her knees in the mud.
Close Up. The lantern hits the ground (doesn't break, but dims).
Wide Shot. Total darkness surrounding her, just a faint red glow.
Close Up. Miri's face dirty and crying, looking at the dying light.
Medium Shot. She curls up around the lantern, giving up.
Close Up. The flame is just a tiny spark now.
Wide Shot. Rain/Leaves falling heavily around her.
Medium Shot. She buries her face in her hands.
Close Up. Her lips moving in silent despair.
Wide Shot. She looks small and defeated.
Close Up. Miri starts whispering a prayer (Psalm).
Medium Shot. The spark inside the lantern suddenly stabilizes.
Close Up. Miri's eyes open wide, seeing the light grow.
Wide Shot. A golden warm sphere of light expands around her, pushing back the dark.
Medium Shot. The rain seems to glow like gold around her.
Close Up. A tear on her cheek shines like a diamond.
Medium Shot. She lifts the lantern up, looking at it with awe.
Close Up. The flame is now strong and steady.
Wide Shot. She stands up slowly, bathed in golden light.
Medium Shot. She looks forward, fear gone.
Wide Shot. Miri climbing a steep rocky path. The lantern lights the way clearly.
Medium Shot. Her dress flowing in the wind, but she stands firm.
Close Up. Boots stepping firmly on the rocks.
Wide Shot. The destination (Synagogue/Hilltop) visible in distance.
Medium Shot. She climbs faster, almost running.
Close Up. Profile view, determined expression, rim lighting.
Wide Shot. Crossing a small bridge/gap.
Medium Shot. The wind blows but the flame doesn't flicker.
Close Up. Smiling as she sees the gate.
Wide Shot. Reaching the top platform.
Wide Shot. Standing at the highest point. Storm clouds breaking apart.
Medium Shot. She raises the lantern high above her head.
Close Up. The light flares into the camera lens.
Wide Shot. The light spreads across the valley below.
Medium Shot. Windows in the village below start lighting up in response.
Close Up. Miri breathing in relief, closing her eyes.
Wide Shot. The sky turns from black to deep blue (pre-dawn).
Medium Shot. She hugs the lantern to her chest, smiling.
Close Up. Looking up at the first star/morning star.
Wide Shot. Fade out on the light of the lantern.
